name: I know you are... but what am I ?
name_original: I know you are... but what am I ?
description:
Have you ever felt like you lost something deep inside you, but can't really explain what? What if it was your identity, your singularity, your individuality...What if you lost yourself? In "I know who you are... but what am I ?" you embody a wanderer, who has to deal with this ontological obstacle: he lost himself, and can't see himself in the mirror anymore. Therefore, throughout his quest of finding himself, he will have to solve puzzles in order to understand who he is, and what he actually lost.

Also, we didn't get the chance to implement a visual tutorial.
* Arrows to move
* E to Interact with normal buttons
* Space to jump
* After the first 1000H press down arrow to activate specific buttons)
* After the second 1000H press R to throw your head)
* After the third 1000H you get to jump higher)
